# timeMapping

**Instance Property**

The time range of the track that this segment presents.

## Declaration

```swift
var timeMapping: CMTimeMapping { get }
```

## Retrieving segment information

- **isEmpty**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the segment is empty.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the segment is empty.
